Class AeXMLStringFormatterTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
          org.activebpel.rt.war.tags.AeAbstractResourceTag

                  org.activebpel.rt.war.tags.AeAbstractPropertyFormatterTag
                      org.activebpel.rt.war.tags.AeXMLStringFormatterTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
public class AeXMLStringFormatterTag
extends AeAbstractPropertyFormatterTag

This class formats an XML string into one that can be properly rendered for display in a browser. Basically this means converting < and > characters into their respective HTML entities.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getFormattedText

protected java.lang.String getFormattedText()
                                     throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Overrides method to formats an XML string into one that will render properly in HTML. It does this by replacing < and > characters with their equivalent HTML entities.

Specified by:
getFormattedText in class AeAbstractPropertyFormatterTag
Returns:
text to be displayed.
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
See Also:
AeAbstractPropertyFormatterTag.getFormattedText()
